section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation that will expire on April 10, 2023.*
section.heading: Short title.
section.text: This chapter may be cited as the "Schools First in Budgeting Amendment Act of 2022".
section.codify:annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of § 38-2851.01, see § 101 of Schools First in Budgeting Emergency Amendment Act of 2022 (D.C. Act 24-722, Jan. 10, 2023, 0 DCR 0).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 101 of Schools First in Budgeting Emergency Amendment Act of 2022 (D.C. Act 24-722, Jan. 10, 2023, 0 DCR 0).
